title: Production Dockerfile Optimization
description: Create an optimized multi-stage Dockerfile for a Dart backend with security best practices.
instructions:
Complete the production Dockerfile for a Serverpod backend. Your Dockerfile should:

1. Use multi-stage builds to minimize final image size
2. Create a non-root user called 'appuser' for security
3. Include a HEALTHCHECK instruction
4. Copy only the compiled server binary and necessary config files
5. Set appropriate environment variables for production
hints: Alpine needs libc6-compat for Dart compiled binaries to run
Include ca-certificates for HTTPS connections and wget for health checks
The config directory contains production.yaml and other essential configuration
Use wget in HEALTHCHECK since curl isn't included in Alpine by default
